description: Experiencing profound admiration and reverence toward someone held in highest esteem. Feeling honor, devotion, and deep desire to express adoration through praise and service. Finding fulfillment and purpose in complete focus on the object of worship, becoming part of something greater.
appeal: Attracts individuals seeking to escape the burden of self-determination through complete devotion to a superior entity or ideal. Appeals to those who find meaning and purpose through service and reverence rather than personal achievement or autonomy. The dynamic provides relief from ego-driven decision making by surrendering will to something perceived as greater and more worthy. This mechanism transforms subjects into devoted followers who derive satisfaction from acts of worship, submission, and service to their chosen deity or dominant figure.
